name: Forward Line
description: Forward Line is a two player, medium weight, skill-based strategy game with a World War Two theme. It features internet, LAN, hotseat multiplayer and single player against the computer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space
